enWisdom: A believer is free from perversion and dissension

Wisdom: الْمُخَاصَمَةُ تُبْدِي سَفَهَ الرَّجُلِ وَلَا تَزِيدُ فِي حَقِّهِ
enWisdom: Disputes demonstrate the foolishness of a person and do not increase his claim
The most loathsome of traits is aggression

Wisdom: أَوْهَنُ الْأَعْدَاءِ كَيْداً مَنْ أَظْهَرَ عَدَاوَتَهُ
enWisdom: The weakest of enemies in plotting is the one who manifests his enmity

Wisdom: إِنَّ السِّبَاعَ هَمُّهَا الْعُدْوَانُ عَلَى غَيْرِهَا
enWisdom: Indeed the [only] concern of predators is attacking other animals

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا سُمِّيَ الْعَدُوُّ عَدُوّاً لِأَنَّهُ يَعْدُو عَلَيْكَ فَمَنْ دَاهَنَكَ فِي مَعَايِبِكَ فَهُوَ الْعَدُوُّ الْعَادِي عَلَيْكَ
enWisdom: The enemy has been named ‘enemy’ because he wrongs you; so one who flatters you for your faults is in actually an enemy who is wronging you
The cornerstone of ignorance is animosity towards people

Wisdom: شَرُّ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَبْتَغِي الْغَوَائِلَ لِلنَّاسِ
enWisdom: The worst person is one who hopes for calamities to befall on others
One who sows enmity [and aggression] reaps loss

Wisdom: مَنْ غَشَّكَ فِي عَدَاوَتِهِ فَلَا تَلُمْهُ وَلَا تَعْذُلْهُ
enWisdom: When one deceives you out of his enmity [with you], then do not blame him or censure him

Wisdom: مَنْ بَالَغَ فِي الْخِصَامِ أَثِمَ وَمَنْ قَصَّرَ عَنْهُ خُصِمَ
enWisdom: One who exceeds in [his] animosity has sinned and one who falls short [and does not show enmity when it is required] is defeated

Wisdom: مِنْ سُوءِ الِاخْتِيَارِ مُغَالَبَةُ الْأَكْفَاءِ وَمُعَادَاةُ الرِّجَالِ
enWisdom: Some bad choices are seeking to overpower one’s equals and making enmity with people

Wisdom: مِنْ سُوءِ الِاخْتِيَارِ مُغَالَبَةُ الْأَكْفَاءِ وَ مُكَاشَفَةُ الْأَعْدَاءِ وَمُنَاوَاةُ مَنْ يَقْدِرُ عَلَى الضَّرَّاءِ
enWisdom: One of the bad choices [that a person can make] is accompanying the wicked

Wisdom: مَا تَلَاحَى اثْنَانِ فَظَهَرَ إِلَّا أَسْفَهُهُمَا
enWisdom: Never do two people [or groups] quarrel but that the more foolish of the two wins the argument
Showing enmity towards the people is a trait of the ignorant ones
